sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from @{pipeline().parameters.p_SCHEMA_NAME}.@{pipeline().parameters.p_TABLE_NAME} where load_type =  @{pipeline().parameters.p_LOAD_TYPE} and is_active_ind = @{pipeline().parameters.p_ACTIVE_FLAG}

select * from @{pipeline().parameters.p_SCHEMA_NAME}.@{pipeline().parameters.p_TABLE_NAME} where load_type = @{pipeline().parameters.p_LOAD_TYPE} and is_active_ind = @{pipeline().parameters.p_ACTIVE_FLAG}

text.value: update md.control_table set LAST_MODIFIED_DATE ='@{utcNow()}' where SOURCE_SCHEMA='@{item().SOURCE_SCHEMA}' and SOURCE_TABLE='@{item().SOURCE_TABLE}'
